thread.title: Charles Koch downgrades his political network’s projected 2016 spending from $889 million to $750 million
thread.title_full: Charles Koch downgrades his political network’s projected 2016 spending from $889 million to $750 million - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Charles Koch downgrades his political network’s projected 2016 spending from $889 million to $750 million
text: This post has been updated. Billionaire industrialist Charles Koch said in an interview published Wednesday that the political network he and his fellow conservative donors support is likely to spend $750 million in the run-up to the 2016 elections, not the $889 million originally set as a goal. In an interview with Kai Ryssdal of […] ...
